_comment: This is the JSON configuration file to run the GNSS positioning algorithm.

log._comment: Configuration of the Log File (Possible values: DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR, FATAL).

inputs._comment2: Select 'true' to use CLK and SP3 products or 'false' to use navigation ephemerides
inputs._comment3: snr threshold to discard RINEX observables (compare with snr control digit). [1-4]: bad, [5:8]: good, 9: excellent

arc._comment1: Select first and last epochs in estimation arc in format YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss

inputs._comment4: Select the input data rate (in seconds). The rate must be consistent with the RINEX OBS rate. Select false to disable.

preprocessor._comment4: Signal strength (SNR) filter. Select value of SNR (dBHz) threshold. Select false to turn off

satellite_status._comment: whether or not to check the SV Accuracy and SV health fields of the navigation message

model._comment: Select the GNSS PNT algorithm. The available algorithms are SPS, PR-PPP
model._comment1: Select the observation model. The available models are combined, uncombined. The combined model requires 2 observations.
model._comment2: Use Doppler measurements to estimate velocity
model._comment3: Select `true` to estimate GGTO or `false` to use the broadcast GGTO
model._comment4: Select `true` to estimate residual ionospheric delay or `false` to disable it

troposphere._comment1: Select Tropospheric model. Available models are 'NONE', 'Saastamoinen', 'GPT3'
troposphere._comment2: Select Tropospheric map function for model GPT3. Available maps are 'Saastamoinen', 'GMF', 'VMF1', 'VMF3'
troposphere._comment3: Select `true` to estimate tropospheric wet delay or `false` to disable tropo estimation

receiver._comment: ARP_offset is null if fetched from RINEX OBS file or defined as a delta vector [H, E, N] in meters
receiver._comment1: PCV Model 0: non-azimuth dependent, 1: azimuth dependent

GPS._comment1: in `pr_obs_std` define the observation noise for the selected pseudorange observations (consistent with the signals defined in `observations`), in meters
GPS._comment2: in `doppler_obs_std` define the observation noise for the selected doppler observations (consistent with the signals defined in `observations`), in Hertz
GPS._comment3: Select Ionospheric model. Available models are 'NONE', 'Klobuchar', 'NTCM-G', 'IONEX'

GAL._comment1: in `pr_obs_std` define the observation noise for the selected pseudorange observations (consistent with the signals defined in `observations`), in meters
GAL._comment2: in `doppler_obs_std` define the observation noise for the selected doppler observations (consistent with the signals defined in `observations`), in Hertz
GAL._comment3: select between INAV or FNAV navigation message
GAL._comment4: Select Ionospheric model. Available models are 'NONE', 'Klobuchar', 'NTCM-G', 'IONEX'

solver._comment1: Select Algorithm. Available is 'WSL' - Weighted Least Squares
solver._comment2: maximum number of iterations in iterative procedure
solver._comment3: stop condition to end iterated least squares. Process ends when (RMS(i-1) - RMS(i)) / RMS(i-1) <= stop_criteria
solver._comment6: Select algorithm to compute the transmission time: 0 - geometric, 1 - pseudorange, 2 - NAPEOS
solver._comment34: Enable / disable relativistic corrections: 0 - disable, 1 - enable
solver._comment5: Elevation filter. Select the value of minimum elevation angle to consider, in degree. Select -1 to turn off
solver._comment7: Initial states and expected covariances for the initial state vector.

output._comment: select output folder (absolute path) to store the run. Set 'default' to store in default path runs/
